meta.description: Determine the maximum data flow from Data Center 0 to Data Center 7 in a high-speed data network.

sets.name: DATA_CENTERS
sets.description: Set of data centers in the network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum data flow capacity between data centers in Tbps.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of data in Tbps between data centers.

objective.name: max_data_flow
objective.description: Maximize the data flow from Data Center 0 to Data Center 7.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Flow from Data Center 0 to 1 does not exceed capacity.
